trans-unit.source: When state=absent and this option is true, any public IP address associated with the VIP will be deleted along with the load balancer.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent will ensure the task does not exist.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent, all other options but dev are ignored, and the module doesn't fail if the device dev doesn't actually exist.

trans-unit.target: 当 state=absent 时，将EIP与设备解除关联并有选择地释放它。

trans-unit.target: 当 state=absent 时，master和logging将设置为False，并且层也将被删除

trans-unit.target: 当 state=absent 时，pim接口配置将设置为默认值，并且pim-sm将在该接口上禁用。

trans-unit.source: When state=absent, the mac_address parameter has to be set.

trans-unit.source: When state=absent, the permission is removed if it exists.

trans-unit.source: When state=default, all supported params will be reset to a default state.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=default 时，所有受支持的参数将重置为默认状态。

trans-unit.source: When state=default, params will be reset to a default state.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=default 时，参数将重置为默认状态。

trans-unit.source: When state=default, supported params will be reset to a default state. These include dr_prio, hello_auth_key, hello_interval, jp_policy_out, jp_policy_in, jp_type_in, jp_type_out, border, neighbor_policy, neighbor_type.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=default 时，支持的参数将重置为默认状态。这些包括 dr_prio ， hello_auth_key ， hello_interval ， jp_policy_out ， jp_policy_in ， jp_type_in ， jp_type_out ， border ， neighbor_policy ， neighbor_type 。

trans-unit.source: When state=default, supported params will be reset to a default state. These include version, startup_query_interval, startup_query_count, robustness, querier_timeout, query_mrt, query_interval, last_member_qrt, last_member_query_count, group_timeout, report_llg, and immediate_leave.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=default 时，支持的参数将重置为默认状态。这些措施包括 version ， startup_query_interval ， startup_query_count ， robustness ， querier_timeout ， query_mrt ， query_interval ， last_member_qrt ， last_member_query_count ， group_timeout ， report_llg 和 immediate_leave 。

trans-unit.source: When state=present will ensure the task exists.

trans-unit.source: When state=present, product_id is not set and the path is a URL, this file will always be downloaded to a temporary directory for idempotency checks, otherwise the file will only be downloaded if the package has not been installed based on the product_id checks.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=present 时，未设置 product_id 且路径为URL，此文件将始终下载到临时目录中以进行幂等检查，否则仅在未基于 product_id 检查安装软件包的情况下才下载该文件。

trans-unit.source: When state=present, a nic will be added if a mac address or label does not previously exists or is unset.

trans-unit.source: When state=present, the permission will be added if it doesn't already exist.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=present 时，如果权限不存在，则会添加该权限。

trans-unit.source: When state=unconfigured, the interface will result with having a default Layer 2 interface, i.e. vlan 1 in access mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 state=unconfigured 时，该接口将具有默认的第2层接口，即处于访问模式的vlan 1。

trans-unit.source: When stateless, specifies a virtual server that accepts traffic matching the virtual server address and load balances the packet to the pool members without attempting to match the packet to a pre-existing connection in the connection table. New connections are immediately removed from the connection table. This addresses the requirement for one-way UDP traffic that needs to be processed at very high throughput levels, for example, load balancing syslog traffic to a pool of syslog servers. Stateless virtual servers are not suitable for processing traffic requiring stateful tracking, such as TCP traffic. Stateless virtual servers do not support iRules, persistence, connection mirroring, rateshaping, or SNAT automap.
trans-unit.target: 当 stateless ，指定接受流量匹配虚拟服务器地址和负载平衡的数据包发送到池成员而不尝试分组匹配在连接表中预先存在的连接的虚拟服务器。新连接将立即从连接表中删除。这解决了对单向UDP流量的需求，该流量需要以非常高的吞吐量级别进行处理，例如，将syslog流量负载均衡到syslog服务器池。无状态虚拟服务器不适用于处理需要状态跟踪的流量，例如TCP流量。无状态虚拟服务器不支持iRules，持久性，连接镜像，速率调整或SNAT自动映射。

trans-unit.source: When stateless, specifies a virtual server that accepts traffic matching the virtual server address and load balances the packet to the pool members without attempting to match the packet to a pre-existing connection in the connection table. New connections are immediately removed from the connection table. This addresses the requirement for one-way UDP traffic that needs to be processed at very high throughput levels, for example, load balancing syslog traffic to a pool of syslog servers. Stateless virtual servers are not suitable for processing traffic that requires stateful tracking, such as TCP traffic. Stateless virtual servers do not support iRules, persistence, connection mirroring, rateshaping, or SNAT automap.
trans-unit.target: 当 stateless ，指定接受流量匹配虚拟服务器地址和负载平衡的数据包发送到池成员而不尝试分组匹配在连接表中预先存在的连接的虚拟服务器。新连接将立即从连接表中删除。这解决了对单向UDP流量的需求，该流量需要以非常高的吞吐量级别进行处理，例如，将syslog流量负载均衡到syslog服务器池。无状态虚拟服务器不适用于处理需要状态跟踪的流量，例如TCP流量。无状态虚拟服务器不支持iRules，持久性，连接镜像，速率调整或SNAT自动映射。

trans-unit.source: When stderr is returned we also always provide this field which is a list of strings, one item per line from the original.
trans-unit.target: 当 stderr 返回，我们也一直提供这一领域是一个字符串列表，每行一个项目从原来的。

trans-unit.source: When strict, the TCP connection limit is honored with no exceptions. This means idle connections will prevent new TCP connections from being made until they expire, even if they could otherwise be reused.
trans-unit.target: 当 strict 的TCP连接数限制很荣幸，没有例外。这意味着空闲连接将阻止建立新的TCP连接，直到它们失效为止，即使它们可以重新使用也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When strict, the TCP connection limit is honored with no exceptions. This means that idle connections will prevent new TCP connections from being made until they expire, even if they could otherwise be reused.
trans-unit.target: 当 strict 的TCP连接数限制很荣幸，没有例外。这意味着空闲连接将阻止建立新的TCP连接，直到它们失效为止，即使它们可以重新使用也是如此。

trans-unit.target: 当 subscribe ，配置“SIP订阅方法” SIP协议安全性载体。

trans-unit.source: When sum-members, specifies that the system adds together the scores of the pool members associated with the monitor's target virtual servers and uses that value in the load balancing operation.

trans-unit.source: When system_mode_maintenance=true it puts all enabled protocols in maintenance mode (using the isolate command). When system_mode_maintenance=false it puts all enabled protocols in normal mode (using the no isolate command).
trans-unit.target: 当 system_mode_maintenance=true 时，它将所有启用的协议置于维护模式（使用isolate命令）。当 system_mode_maintenance=false 时，它将所有启用的协议置于普通模式（使用noisolate命令）。

trans-unit.source: When system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=true it prevents the dynamic searching of enabled protocols and executes commands configured in a maintenance-mode profile. Use this option if you want the system to use a maintenance-mode profile that you have created. When system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=false it prevents the dynamic searching of enabled protocols and executes commands configured in a normal-mode profile. Use this option if you want the system to use a normal-mode profile that you have created.
trans-unit.target: 当 system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=true 时,它将阻止动态搜索已启用的协议，并执行在维护模式配置文件中配置的命令。如果您希望系统使用您创建的维护模式配置文件，请使用此选项。当 system_mode_maintenance_dont_generate_profile=false 时,它将阻止动态搜索已启用的协议，并执行在普通模式配置文件中配置的命令。如果希望系统使用已创建的普通模式配置文件，请使用此选项。

If you select this option, you must also provide IP addresses for the local and remote endpoints of the IPsec tunnel.
trans-unit.target: 当 tunnel 时，指定一种模式，该模式包括报头和有效载荷的封装（添加新的IP报头，以及添加ESP报头，尾部和身份验证标签）。如果选择此选项，则还必须提供IPsec隧道的本地和远程端点的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When tx-rx, the interface honors pause frames from its partner, and also generates pause frames when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 当 tx-rx 时，接口接受其伙伴的暂停帧，并在必要时生成暂停帧。

trans-unit.target: 当 tx 时，接口将忽略其伙伴的暂停帧，并在必要时生成暂停帧。

trans-unit.source: When txonly, the interface transmits LLDP messages to neighbor devices, but does not receive LLDP messages from neighbor devices.
trans-unit.target: 当 txonly 时，接口将LLDP消息发送到邻居设备，但不从邻居设备接收LLDP消息。

trans-unit.source: When txrx, the interface transmits LLDP messages to and receives LLDP messages from neighboring devices.
trans-unit.target: 当 txrx 时，接口向相邻设备发送LLDP消息并从其接收LLDP消息。

trans-unit.target: 为 txt 时，配置“ DNS TXT查询” DNS协议安全性向量。

trans-unit.target: 当 type 为 management-port 时，指定用于将消息发送到指定位置的协议。

trans-unit.source: When type is remote-syslog, specifies the management port log destination, which will be used to forward the logs to a single log server, or a remote high-speed log destination, which will be used to forward the logs to a pool of remote log servers.
trans-unit.target: 当 type 为 remote-syslog 时，指定管理端口日志目标（用于将日志转发到单个日志服务器）或远程高速日志目标（用于将日志转发到远程池）日志服务器。

trans-unit.source: When type is reset, the system resets the connection upon event.

trans-unit.source: When type is set_variable, the system sets a variable based on the evaluated Tcl expression based on event.

trans-unit.source: When type is splunk or arcsight, specifies the log destination to which logs are forwarded. This log destination may be a management port destination, a remote high-speed log destination, or a remote Syslog destination which is configured to send logs to an ArcSight or Splunk server.
trans-unit.target: 当 type 为 splunk 或 arcsight 时，指定将日志转发到的日志目标。该日志目标可以是管理端口目标，远程高速日志目标或配置为将日志发送到ArcSight或Splunk服务器的远程Syslog目标。

trans-unit.source: When type is: ip, address, addr if the addresses use a non-default route domain, they must be explicit about it, meaning they must contain a route domain notation % e.g. 10.10.1.1%11. This is true regardless if the data group resides in a partition or not.
trans-unit.target: 当 type 为： ip ， address ， addr 时,如果地址使用非默认路由域，则它们必须是明确的，这意味着它们必须包含路由域符号 % ,例如10.10.1.1％11。无论数据组是否驻留在分区中，这都是正确的。

trans-unit.source: When type is: ip, address, addr if the addresses use non default route domain, they must be explicit about it that is they must contain a route domain notation % eg. 10.10.1.1%11. This is true regardless if the data group resides in a partition or not.

trans-unit.source: When type set to usb2 or usb3, this parameter is not required.

trans-unit.target: 当 type=PTR 时,仅应提供IP的部分内容。

trans-unit.source: When wait is True, the number of seconds to wait for the ready_replicas status to equal replicas. If the status is not reached within the allotted time, an error will result. In the case of a Job, this option is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当 wait 为True时，等待ready_replicas状态等于副本的秒数。如果在分配的时间内未达到状态，将导致错误。如果是Job，则忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: When yes allows any application publisher.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 允许任何应用程序发布者。

trans-unit.source: When yes allows traffic from applications run on emulators.

trans-unit.source: When yes for a gigabit fiber interface, the media setting will be forced, and no auto-negotiation will be performed.

trans-unit.source: When yes the device certificate and key will be replaced
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则将替换设备证书和密钥

trans-unit.source: When yes the device will allow traffic from rooted Android devices.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择 yes 该设备将允许来自已扎根的Android设备的流量。

trans-unit.source: When yes the network access connection uses Datagram Transport Level Security instead of TCP, to provide better throughput for high demand applications like VoIP or streaming video.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 则网络访问连接将使用数据报传输级别安全性而不是TCP，以为VoIP或流视频等高要求应用程序提供更好的吞吐量。

trans-unit.source: When yes the system advertises an option, such as a time-stamp to the server only if it was negotiated with the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择“ yes 则系统仅在与客户端协商后才向服务器发布选项，例如时间戳。

trans-unit.source: When yes the system blocks all requests that match a signature, and provides the client with a support ID number.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，系统将阻止所有与签名匹配的请求，并为客户端提供支持ID号。

trans-unit.source: When yes the system does not support integrated IP filtering.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 则系统不支持集成IP过滤。

trans-unit.source: When yes the system redirects error messages and additional information to the /var/log/monitors/<monitor_name>-<node_name>-<port>.log file.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 则系统将错误消息和其他信息重定向到/ /var/log/monitors/<monitor_name>-<node_name>-<port>.log 文件。

trans-unit.source: When yes the system uses early fast retransmits to reduce the recovery time for connections that are receive-buffer or user-data limited.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 则系统使用早期的快速重传来减少受接收缓冲区或用户数据限制的连接的恢复时间。

trans-unit.source: When yes will always result in a change when executing the module.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes 则执行模块时总是会导致更改。

trans-unit.source: When yes, all virtual servers that use the same OneConnect and other internal network profiles can share connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则使用同一OneConnect和其他内部网络配置文件的所有虚拟服务器都可以共享连接。

trans-unit.source: When yes, applies the HSTS policy to the HSTS host and its subdomains.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则将HSTS策略应用于HSTS主机及其子域。

trans-unit.source: When yes, client certificate is retained in SSL session.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则客户端证书将保留在SSL会话中。

trans-unit.source: When yes, closes a connection when a BYE transaction finishes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，当BYE事务完成时，关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: When yes, connections to a server that do not support SNI extension will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择 yes ，则将拒绝与不支持SNI扩展的服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: When yes, connections to a server that does not support SNI extension will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则将拒绝与不支持SNI扩展的服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: When yes, disallows any updates to the resources that the iApp service has created, if they are not updated directly through the iApp.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则不允许对iApp服务创建的资源进行任何更新，如果这些更新不是通过iApp直接更新的话。

trans-unit.source: When yes, enables the HTTP Strict Transport Security settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，可以使HTTP严格传输安全设置。

trans-unit.source: When yes, enables the interface to pass traffic.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则启用接口传递流量。

trans-unit.source: When yes, ensures that the Failover Multicast configuration is enabled and if no further multicast configuration is provided, ensures that multicast_interface, multicast_address and multicast_port are the defaults specified in each option's description. When no, ensures that Failover Multicast configuration is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，请确保启用了故障转移多播配置，并且如果未提供其他多播配置，请确保 multicast_interface ， multicast_address 和 multicast_port 是每个选项的描述中指定的默认值。如果为 no ，则确保禁用故障转移多播配置。

trans-unit.source: When yes, ensures that when a local DNS makes repetitive requests on behalf of a client, the system reconnects the client to the same resource as previous requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则确保当本地DNS代表客户端发出重复请求时，系统会将客户端重新连接到与先前请求相同的资源。

trans-unit.source: When yes, ensures the Failover Multicast configuration is enabled and, if no further multicast configuration is provided, ensures that multicast_interface, multicast_address and multicast_port are the defaults specified in the description of each option.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，请确保启用了“故障转移多播”配置，并且如果未提供其他多播配置，请确保 multicast_interface ， multicast_address 和 multicast_port 是每个选项的描述中指定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: When yes, increases the congestion window by basing the amount to increase on the number of previously unacknowledged bytes that each ACK covers.
trans-unit.target: 当为 yes ，将根据每个ACK覆盖的先前未确认字节的数量增加数量，从而增加拥塞窗口。

trans-unit.source: When yes, increases the congestion window by basing the increase amount on the number of previously unacknowledged bytes that each ACK covers.
trans-unit.target: 当为 yes ，通过将增加量基于每个ACK覆盖的先前未确认字节的数量来增加拥塞窗口。

trans-unit.source: When yes, inserts a Record-Route SIP header, which indicates the next hop for the following SIP request messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则插入一个Record-Route SIP标头，该标头指示随后的SIP请求消息的下一跳。

trans-unit.source: When yes, inserts a Via header in the forwarded SIP request.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则在转发的SIP请求中插入Via标头。

trans-unit.source: When yes, requests from mobile applications built with Anti-Bot Mobile SDK will be detected and handled according to the parameters set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，则将根据设置的参数检测和处理来自使用Anti-Bot Mobile SDK构建的移动应用程序的请求。

trans-unit.source: When yes, run Puppet agent with --noop switch set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 yes ，请在设置了 --noop 开关的情况下运行Puppet代理。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies IP Intelligence shun list events are logged.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定记录IP Intelligence避开列表事件。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies a FAST join, allowing data to be sent on the MP_JOIN_SYN, which can allow a server response to occur in parallel with the JOIN.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定FAST联接，以允许在MP_JOIN_SYN上发送数据，这可以允许服务器响应与JOIN并行发生。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies all persistent connections from a client IP address that go to the same virtual IP address also go to the same node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定来自客户端IP地址的所有持久连接（连接到相同的虚拟IP地址）也将连接到同一节点。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies all persistent connections from the same client IP address go to the same node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定来自同一客户端IP地址的所有持久连接都将到达同一节点。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies if the active unit goes into the standby mode, the system mirrors any persistence records to its peer.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定活动单元是否进入待机模式，系统会将所有持久性记录镜像到其对等方。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies remotely triggered blackholing events are logged.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定记录远程触发的黑洞事件。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies significantly improved performance to Microsoft Windows and MacOS peers who are writing out on a very small send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则为正在很小的发送缓冲区上写出的Microsoft Windows和MacOS对等体指定显着改善的性能。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that all persistent connections from a client IP address that go to the same virtual IP address also go to the same node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定来自客户机IP地址的所有持续连接都将转到相同的虚拟IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that all persistent connections from the same client IP address go to the same node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定来自同一客户端IP地址的所有持久连接都将到达同一节点。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that connections in a TIME-WAIT state are reused when the system receives a SYN packet, indicating a request for a new connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定当系统接收到SYN数据包（指示请求新连接）时重用处于TIME-WAIT状态的连接。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that if the active unit goes into the standby mode, the system mirrors any persistence records to its peer.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定如果活动单元进入备用模式，则系统会将所有持久性记录镜像到其对等方。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the VLAN takes the specified fail_safe_action if the system detects a loss of traffic on this VLAN's interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 当为 yes 时，如果系统检测到该VLAN接口上的流量丢失，则指定VLAN采取指定的 fail_safe_action 。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the internal DNS resolver randomizes character case in domain name queries issued to the root DNS servers.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定内部DNS解析程序在发布给根DNS服务器的域名查询中随机分配字符大小写。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the monitor ignores down responses for the duration of the monitor timeout. Once the monitor timeout is reached without the system receiving an up response, the system marks the object down.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定监视器在监视器超时期间忽略向下响应。一旦达到监视器超时而系统未收到向上响应，则系统会将对象标记为向下。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system advertises the same mss to the server as was negotiated with the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统将与客户端协商的相同的mss通告给服务器。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system allows you to specify that pool member connection limits will be overridden for persisted clients.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统允许您指定将为持久客户端覆盖池成员连接限制。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system blocks a TCP selective ACK SackOK option from passing to the server on an initiating SYN.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统阻止TCP选择性ACK SackOK选项在启动SYN时传递给服务器。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system can use any pool that contains this persistence record.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统可以使用包含此持久性记录的任何池。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system generates initial sequence numbers for SYN packets, according to RFC 1948.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统根据RFC 1948为SYN数据包生成初始序列号。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system initializes a connection when it receives any TCP packet, rather that requiring a SYN packet for connection initiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统在接收到任何TCP数据包时初始化连接，而不是要求SYN数据包来启动连接。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system inserts an X-Forwarded-For header in an HTTP request with the client IP address, to use with connection pooling.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统在具有客户端IP地址的HTTP请求中插入X-Forwarded-For标头，以用于连接池。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system reassembles IP fragments.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统重新组合IP片段。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system returns a RCODE response to Wide IP requests after exhausting all load-balancing methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定在用尽所有负载平衡方法之后，系统对广域网IP请求返回RCODE响应。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system sends a reset packet (RST) in addition to deleting the connection, when a connection exceeds the idle timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定当连接超过空闲超时值时，除了删除连接之外，系统还发送一个重置数据包（RST）。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system supports the link aggregation control protocol (LACP), which monitors the trunk by exchanging control packets over the member links to determine the health of the links.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统支持链路聚合控制协议（LACP），该协议通过在成员链路上交换控制数据包以确定链路的健康状况来监视中继。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system uses TCP timestamp options to measure the round-trip time to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统使用TCP时间戳选项来测量到客户端的往返时间。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system uses TCP timestamp options to measure the round-trip time to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统使用TCP时间戳选项来度量到服务器的往返时间。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that the system verifies that the return route to an initial packet is the same VLAN from which the packet originated.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统验证到初始数据包的返回路由与该数据包所源自的VLAN是否相同。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies that you must manually re-enable the resource after an unsuccessful monitor check.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定您必须在监视器检查失败后手动重新启用资源。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the VLAN takes the specified fail_safe_action if the system detects a loss of traffic on this VLAN's interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 当为 yes 时，如果系统检测到该VLAN接口上的流量丢失，则指定VLAN采取指定的 fail_safe_action 。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the internal DNS resolver randomizes character case in domain name queries issued to the root DNS servers.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定内部DNS解析程序在发布给根DNS服务器的域名查询中随机分配字符大小写。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the monitor ignores down responses for the duration of the monitor timeout. Once the monitor timeout is reached without the system receiving an up response, the system marks the object down.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定监视器在监视器超时期间忽略向下响应。一旦达到监视器超时而系统未收到向上响应，则系统会将对象标记为向下。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the next time you reboot the system, the system boots to an ISO image on the network, rather than an internal media drive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定下次重新引导系统时，系统将引导至网络上的ISO映像，而不是内部介质驱动器。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the server sends responses to clients in the HTTP/1.0 format.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定服务器以HTTP / 1.0格式向客户端发送响应。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the server uses workarounds for HTTP 1.1 close issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定服务器对HTTP 1.1关闭问题使用解决方法。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the system accepts Multipath TCP (MPTCP) connections, which allow multiple client-side flows to connect to a single server-side flow.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统接受多路径TCP（MPTCP）连接，该连接允许多个客户端流连接到单个服务器端流。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the system advertises an option (such as time stamps) to the server only when the option is negotiated with the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统仅在与客户端协商选项后才将选项（例如时间戳）发布到服务器。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the system advertises the same mss to the server as was negotiated with the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统将与客户端协商的相同的mss通告给服务器。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the system allows you to specify that pool member connection limits will be overridden for persisted clients.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 yes ，则指定系统允许您指定持久化客户端将覆盖池成员连接限制。

trans-unit.source: When yes, specifies the system attempts to advertise the same maximum segment size (MSS) to the server-side connection as that of the client-side connection.

trans-unit.source: When restart is set to true, the module will only restart the container if no config changes are detected. Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty.
trans-unit.target: 当restart设置为 true 时，仅当未检测到配置更改时，模块才会重启容器。请注意，有几个选项具有默认值。如果要重新启动的容器对这些选项使用不同的值，则将重新创建它。可能导致此问题的默认值选项是auto_remove，detach，init，Interactive，memory，paused，privileged，read_only和tty。

trans-unit.source: When restart is set to true, the module will only restart the container if no config changes are detected. Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty. This behavior can be changed by setting container_default_behavior to no_defaults, which will be the default value from community.docker 2.0.0 on.

When restart is set to true, the module will only restart the container if no config changes are detected. Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty. This behavior can be changed by setting container_default_behavior to no_defaults, which will be the default value from community.general 3.0.0 on.

Please note that several options have default values; if the container to be restarted uses different values for these options, it will be recreated instead. The options with default values which can cause this are auto_remove, detach, init, interactive, memory, paused, privileged, read_only and tty. This behavior can be changed by setting container_default_behavior to no_defaults , which will be the default value from community.general 3.0.0 on.

trans-unit.source: When Ansible receives a non-zero return code from a command or a failure from a module, by default it stops executing on that host and continues on other hosts. However, in some circumstances you may want different behavior. Sometimes a non-zero return code indicates success. Sometimes you want a failure on one host to stop execution on all hosts. Ansible provides tools and settings to handle these situations and help you get the behavior, output, and reporting you want.
trans-unit.target: 当Ansible收到来自命令的非零返回代码或来自模块的失败时,默认情况下,它将停止在该主机上执行,并继续在其他主机上执行。然而,在某些情况下,您可能希望有不同的行为。有时,非零的返回代码表示成功。有时,您希望在一台主机上的失败能够在所有主机上停止执行。Ansible提供了处理这些情况的工具和设置,并帮助您获得您想要的行为、输出和报告。

trans-unit.source: When BIG-IP starts, the VMs are booted sequentially; not in parallel. This means it is not unusual for a vCMP host with many guests to take a long time (60+ minutes) to reboot and bring all the guests online. The BIG-IP chassis will be available before all vCMP guests are online.
trans-unit.target: 当BIG-IP启动时,虚拟机是按顺序启动的,而不是并行启动。这意味着有许多客人的vCMP主机需要很长时间(60分钟以上)才能重新启动并使所有客人上线,这并不罕见。在所有vCMP客座上线之前,BIG-IP机箱将可用。

trans-unit.source: When a task fails on a host, handlers which were previously notified will not be run on that host. This can lead to cases where an unrelated failure can leave a host in an unexpected state. For example, a task could update a configuration file and notify a handler to restart some service. If a task later on in the same play fails, the service will not be restarted despite the configuration change.
trans-unit.target: 当任务在主机上失败时，先前通知的处理程序将不会在该主机上运行。这可能导致不相关的故障可能会使主机处于意外状态。例如，任务可以更新配置文件并通知处理程序重新启动某些服务。如果稍后在同一播放中执行的任务失败，则即使配置发生更改，该服务也不会重新启动。

trans-unit.source: When an HTTPS proxy is present, or when using Azure Stack, it may be necessary to disable certificate validation for Azure endpoints in the Azure modules. This is not a recommended security practice, but may be necessary when the system CA store cannot be altered to include the necessary CA certificate. Certificate validation can be controlled by setting the “cert_validation_mode” value in a credential profile, via the “AZURE_CERT_VALIDATION_MODE” environment variable, or by passing the “cert_validation_mode” argument to any Azure module. The default value is “validate”; setting the value to “ignore” will prevent all certificate validation. The module argument takes precedence over a credential profile value, which takes precedence over the environment value.
trans-unit.target: 当存在HTTPS代理或使用Azure Stack时，可能有必要为Azure模块中的Azure终结点禁用证书验证。这不是建议的安全做法，但是当无法更改系统CA存储以包括必要的CA证书时，可能有必要。可以通过在凭据配置文件中设置“ cert_validation_mode”值，通过“ AZURE_CERT_VALIDATION_MODE”环境变量或将“ cert_validation_mode”参数传递给任何Azure模块来控制证书验证。默认值为“ validate”；将值设置为“忽略”将阻止所有证书验证。 module参数优先于凭据配置文件值，后者优先于环境值。

Other modules that do not support check mode will also take no action, but just will not report what changes they might have made.

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to the device running-configuration, the changes are not copied to non-volatile storage by default. Using this argument will change that before. If the argument is set to always, then the running-config will always be copied to the start-up configuration and the modified flag will always be set to True. If the argument is set to modified, then the running-config will only be copied to the start-up configuration if it has changed since the last save to configuration. If the argument is set to never, the running-config will never be copied to the configuration. If the argument is set to changed, then the running-config will only be copied to the configuration if the task has made a change.
trans-unit.target: 对设备的运行配置进行更改时，默认情况下不会将更改复制到非易失性存储中。使用此参数将改变以前的情况。如果参数设置为always，那么running-config将始终复制到启动配置，并且Modifyed标志将始终设置为True。如果该参数设置为Modifyed，则running-config仅在自上次保存到配置以来已更改时才复制到启动配置。如果参数设置为never，则running-config将永远不会复制到配置中。如果参数设置为更改，则只有在任务进行了更改后，running-config才会被复制到配置中。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to the device running-configuration, the changes are not copied to non-volatile storage by default. Using this argument will change that before. If the argument is set to always, then the running-config will always be copied to the startup configuration and the modified flag will always be set to True. If the argument is set to modified, then the running-config will only be copied to the startup configuration if it has changed since the last save to startup configuration. If the argument is set to never, the running-config will never be copied to the startup configuration. If the argument is set to changed, then the running-config will only be copied to the startup configuration if the task has made a change.
trans-unit.target: 对设备的运行配置进行更改时，默认情况下不会将更改复制到非易失性存储中。使用此参数将改变以前的情况。如果参数设置为always，那么running-config将始终复制到启动配置，并且修改后的标志将始终设置为True。如果将参数设置为Modifyed，则只有在自上次保存到启动配置以来更改了running-config时，才会将running-config复制到启动配置。如果参数设置为never，则running-config将永远不会复制到启动配置中。如果参数设置为更改，则只有在任务进行了更改后，running-config才会被复制到启动配置。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to the device running-configuration, the changes are not copied to non-volatile storage by default. Using this argument will change that behavior. If the argument is set to always, then the running-config will always be copied to the startup-config and the modified flag will always be set to True. If the argument is set to modified, then the running-config will only be copied to the startup-config if it has changed since the last save to startup-config. If the argument is set to never, the running-config will never be copied to the startup-config. trans-unit.target: 对设备的运行配置进行更改时，默认情况下不会将更改复制到非易失性存储中。使用此参数将改变该行为。如果参数设置为always，那么running-config将始终被复制到startup-config，并且Modifyed标志将始终设置为True。如果将参数设置为Modifyed，则如果运行配置自上次保存到startup-config后已更改，则只会将其复制到startup-config。如果参数设置为never，则运行配置将永远不会复制到启动配置。如果参数设置为改变，那么运行配置只会被复制到启动配置如果任务已经做出了改变。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to the device running-configuration, the changes are not copied to non-volatile storage by default. Using this argument will change that behavior. If the argument is set to always, then the running-config will always be saved and the modified flag will always be set to True. If the argument is set to modified, then the running-config will only be saved if it has changed since the last save to startup-config. If the argument is set to never, the running-config will never be saved. If the argument is set to changed, then the running-config will only be saved if the task has made a change.
trans-unit.target: 对设备的运行配置进行更改时，默认情况下不会将更改复制到非易失性存储中。使用此参数将改变该行为。如果参数设置为always，则将始终保存running-config，并且修改后的标志将始终设置为True。如果参数设置为Modifyed，则只有在上次保存到startup-config之后更改了running-config，才会保存该配置。如果参数设置为never，则将永远不会保存运行配置。如果参数设置为改变，那么运行配置将仅在任务已进行了更改保存。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to the device running-configuration, the changes are not copied to non-volatile storage by default. Using this argument will change that. If the argument is set to always, then the running-config will always be copied to the startup-config and the module will always return as changed. If the argument is set to never, the running-config will never be copied to the startup-config. If the argument is set to changed, then the running-config will only be copied to the startup-config if the task has made a change.
trans-unit.target: 对设备的运行配置进行更改时，默认情况下不会将更改复制到非易失性存储中。使用此参数将改变这一点。如果参数设置为always，那么running-config将始终复制到startup-config，并且模块将始终按更改返回。如果参数设置为never，则运行配置将永远不会复制到启动配置。如果参数设置为改变，那么运行配置只会被复制到启动配置如果任务已经做出了改变。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to the project, the project will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 当项目发生变化时,项目将被更新。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to user, the user will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 当用户发生变化时,用户将被更新。

trans-unit.source: When changes are required to both firmware and nvsram and task is executed against SANtricity Web Services Proxy, the firmware will have to complete before nvsram can be installed.
trans-unit.target: 当需要更改固件和 nvsram,并对 SANtricity Web Services Proxy 执行任务时,固件必须在安装 nvsram 之前完成。

trans-unit.source: When checked (enabled), inserts a secure Via header in the forwarded SIP request.
trans-unit.target: 勾选(启用)时,在转发的SIP请求中插入一个安全的Via头。

trans-unit.source: When checked (enabled), specifies no DSS option is sent on the JOIN ACK.
trans-unit.target: 当选中(启用)时,指定在 JOIN ACK 上不发送 DSS 选项。

trans-unit.source: When checked (enabled), specifies the system can send fewer than one ACK (acknowledgment) segment per data segment received.
trans-unit.target: 勾选(启用)时,指定系统每收到一个数据段可以发送少于一个ACK(确认)段。

trans-unit.source: When checked enabled, specifies the system accepts SSH communication.
trans-unit.target: 选中 enabled ，指定系统接受SSH通信。

trans-unit.source: When checking a port started will ensure the port is open, stopped will check that it is closed, drained will check for active connections.
trans-unit.target: 当检查端口 started 将确保端口已打开， stopped 将检查其是否已关闭， drained 将检查活动的连接。

trans-unit.source: When checking a port, started will ensure the port is open, stopped will check that is it closed and drained will check for active connections.
trans-unit.target: 检查端口时， started 将确保端口打开， stopped 将确保端口已关闭， drained 将检查活动连接。

trans-unit.source: When checking for a file or a search string present or started will ensure that the file or string is present before continuing, absent will check that file is absent or removed.
trans-unit.target: 当检查文件或搜索字符串是否 present 或已 started 将确保文件或字符串存在，然后再继续，如果 absent 则将检查文件是否存在或已删除。

trans-unit.source: When checking for a file or a search string present or started will ensure that the file or string is present, absent will check that the file or search string is absent or removed.
trans-unit.target: 当检查文件或搜索字符串是否 present 或已 started 将确保文件或字符串存在，如果 absent 存在，将检查文件或搜索字符串是否存在或已删除。

trans-unit.source: When checking for a running process present will block execution until the process exists, or until the timeout has been reached. absent will block execution until the process no longer exists, or until the timeout has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 当检查是否存在正在运行的进程时 present 它将阻止执行，直到该进程存在或达到超时为止。 absent 将阻止执行，直到该进程不再存在或达到超时为止。

trans-unit.source: When choosing a control node, bear in mind that any management system benefits from being run near the machines being managed. If you are running Ansible in a cloud, consider running it from a machine inside that cloud. In most cases this will work better than on the open Internet.
trans-unit.target: 在选择控制节点时,请记住,任何管理系统都会从运行在被管理的机器附近获益。如果你在云中运行Ansible,请考虑从该云内的机器上运行它。在大多数情况下,这将比在开放的互联网上效果更好。

trans-unit.source: When chunksize is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当改变chunksize时。

trans-unit.source: When cluster FIPS mode is off, the default value is 'none'.
trans-unit.target: 当集群FIPS模式关闭时,默认值为 "无"。

trans-unit.source: When cluster FIPS mode is off, the default value is 'none'. When cluster FIPS mode is on, the default value is 'aes128'.
trans-unit.target: 当集群FIPS模式关闭时,默认值是'none'。当集群FIPS模式开启时,默认值为'aes128'。

trans-unit.source: When cluster FIPS mode is on, 'aes128' is the only possible and valid value.
trans-unit.target: 当集群FIPS模式开启时,'aes128'是唯一可能的有效值。

trans-unit.source: When cluster FIPS mode is on, 'sha' and 'sha2-256' are the only possible and valid values.
trans-unit.target: 当集群FIPS模式开启时,'sha'和'sha2-256'是唯一可能和有效的值。

trans-unit.source: When cluster FIPS mode is on, the default value is 'sha'.
trans-unit.target: 当集群FIPS模式开启时,默认值为 "sha"。

trans-unit.source: When cluster parameters are not passed
trans-unit.target: 当群集参数未被传递时

trans-unit.source: When combining Conditionals with a loop, the when: statement is processed separately for each item. See The When Statement for examples.
trans-unit.target: 将条件句与循环结合使用 when: ，将对每个项目分别处理when：语句。有关示例，请参见While语句。

trans-unit.source: When combining conditionals with a loop, the when: statement is processed separately for each item. See Basic conditionals with when for examples.
trans-unit.target: 将条件语句与循环组合 when: ，将对每个项目分别处理when：语句。有关示例，请参见带有when的基本条件。

trans-unit.source: When command=create, modify or restore then wait for the database to enter the 'available' state. When command=delete wait for the database to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 当command=create、修改或还原时,则等待数据库进入 "可用 "状态。当command=delete时,等待数据库终止。

trans-unit.source: When command=create, replicate, modify or restore then wait for the database to enter the 'available' state. When command=delete wait for the database to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 当command=create、replicate、modify或restore时,则等待数据库进入 "可用 "状态。当command=delete时,等待数据库终止。

trans-unit.source: When committing configuration, however, the network OS converts abbreviations into long-form commands. Whether you use shut or shutdown on GigabitEthernet1/0/11, the result in the configuration is the same: shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在提交配置时，网络OS会将缩写词转换为长格式命令。无论在 GigabitEthernet1/0/11 shutdown 上使用 shut down还是shutdown，配置的结果都是相同的： shutdown 。

trans-unit.source: When communicating with a remote device, you have control over how long Ansible maintains the connection to that device, as well as how long Ansible waits for a command to complete on that device. Each of these options can be set as variables in your playbook files, environment variables, or settings in your ansible.cfg file.
trans-unit.target: 与远程设备通信时，您可以控制Ansible维持与该设备的连接的时间，以及Ansible在该设备上等待命令完成的时间。这些选项中的每一个都可以设置为您的剧本文件中的变量，环境变量或ansible.cfg文件中的设置。

trans-unit.source: When config is configured.
trans-unit.target: 配置时。

trans-unit.source: When configuring LDAP device authentication for the first time, if this parameter is not specified, the default port is 389.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置LDAP设备身份验证时，如果未指定此参数，则默认端口为 389 。

trans-unit.source: When configuring LDAP device authentication for the first time, if this parameter is not specified, the default port is samaccountname.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置LDAP设备认证时，如果未指定此参数，则默认端口为 samaccountname 。

trans-unit.source: When configuring LDAP device authentication for the first time, the default port is 389 if this parameter is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 首次配置LDAP设备身份验证时，如果未指定此参数，则默认端口为 389 。

trans-unit.source: When configuring TACACS+ auth for the first time, this value is required.
trans-unit.target: 第一次配置TACACS+auth时,这个值是必须的。

trans-unit.source: When configuring this form of system authentication, this setting is required.
trans-unit.target: 配置这种形式的系统认证时,需要进行此设置。

trans-unit.source: When connecting to Docker daemon with TLS, you might need to install additional Python packages. For the Docker SDK for Python, version 2.4 or newer, this can be done by installing docker[tls] with ansible.builtin.pip.
trans-unit.target: 使用TLS连接到Docker守护程序时，您可能需要安装其他Python软件包。对于适用于Python的2.4版或更高版本的Docker SDK，可以通过使用ansible.builtin.pip安装docker docker[tls] 来完成。

trans-unit.source: When connecting to Docker daemon with TLS, you might need to install additional Python packages. For the Docker SDK for Python, version 2.4 or newer, this can be done by installing docker[tls] with pip.
trans-unit.target: 使用TLS连接到Docker守护程序时，您可能需要安装其他Python软件包。对于适用于Python的2.4版或更高版本的Docker SDK，可以通过使用pip安装 docker[tls] 来完成。

trans-unit.source: When connecting to a Windows host, there are several different options that can be used when authenticating with an account. The authentication type may be set on inventory hosts or groups with the ansible_winrm_transport variable.
trans-unit.target: 连接到Windows主机时，使用帐户身份验证时可以使用几个不同的选项。可以使用 ansible_winrm_transport 变量在清单主机或清单主机上设置身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: When contacting a storage array directly the collection includes details about the array, controllers, management interfaces, hostside interfaces, driveside interfaces, disks, storage pools, volumes, snapshots, and features.
trans-unit.target: 当直接联系存储阵列时,该集合包括有关阵列、控制器、管理接口、主机侧接口、驱动器侧接口、磁盘、存储池、卷、快照和功能的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: When contacting a web services proxy the collection will include basic information regarding the storage systems that are under its management.
trans-unit.target: 当联系网络服务代理时,收集的信息将包括其管理的存储系统的基本信息。

trans-unit.source: When cpu usage on an se exceeds this threshold, virtual services hosted on this se may be rebalanced to other ses to reduce load.
trans-unit.target: 当一个se上的cpu使用量超过这个阈值时,在这个se上托管的虚拟服务可能会被重新平衡到其他se上以减少负载。

trans-unit.source: When cpu usage on an se falls below the minimum threshold, virtual services hosted on the se may be consolidated onto other underutilized ses.
trans-unit.target: 当se上的cpu使用率低于最低阈值时,se上托管的虚拟服务可能会被整合到其他未充分使用的se上。

trans-unit.source: When created with set_facts’s cacheable option, variables have the high precedence in the play, but are the same as a host facts precedence when they come from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 当使用set_facts的cacheable选项创建时，变量在播放中具有较高的优先级，但与来自缓存的主机事实优先级相同。

trans-unit.source: When created with set_facts’s cacheable option, variables will have the high precedence in the play, but will be the same as a host facts precedence when they come from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 当使用set_facts的cacheable选项创建时，变量在播放中将具有较高的优先级，但是与来自缓存的主机事实优先级相同。

trans-unit.source: When created, optionally waits for it to be ‘running’.
trans-unit.target: 创建后，可以选择等待它“运行”。

trans-unit.source: When creating a "cluster" role, the node name will appear as the prefix in the name of LIF.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 "集群 "角色时,节点名称将作为前缀出现在LIF的名称中。

trans-unit.source: When creating a VM with the azure_rm_virtualmachine module, you need to explicitly set the managed_disk_type parameter to change the OS disk to a managed disk. Otherwise, the OS disk becomes an unmanaged disk..
trans-unit.target: 使用 azure_rm_virtualmachine 模块创建VM时，需要显式设置 managed_disk_type 参数，以将OS磁盘更改为托管磁盘。否则，OS磁盘将成为非托管磁盘。

trans-unit.source: When creating a VM, short_hostname defaults to name.
trans-unit.target: 创建虚拟机时，short_hostname默认为name。

trans-unit.source: When creating a VPN Gateway you must provide the name of an existing virtual network.
trans-unit.target: 创建VPN网关时,必须提供现有虚拟网络的名称。

trans-unit.source: When creating a cluster, node_name is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 创建集群时， node_name 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When creating a network interface a subnet must already exist with a network prefix that covers the IP address of the interface being created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建网络接口时,必须已经存在一个子网,其网络前缀覆盖正在创建的接口的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When creating a network interface you must provide the name of an existing virtual network, the name of an existing subnet within the virtual network.
trans-unit.target: 创建网络接口时,必须提供现有虚拟网络的名称、虚拟网络中现有子网的名称。

trans-unit.source: When creating a network interface, if no security group name is provided, a default security group will be created.
trans-unit.target: 创建网络接口时,如果没有提供安全组名称,将创建一个默认的安全组。

trans-unit.source: When creating a network interface, if you specify private_ip_address=Static, you must provide a value for private_ip_address.
trans-unit.target: 创建网络接口时，如果指定private_ip_address = Static，则必须为private_ip_address提供一个值。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new GTM virtual server, if this parameter is not specified, a default of * will be used.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的GTM虚拟服务器时，如果未指定此参数，则将使用默认值 * 。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new GTM virtual server, if this parameter is not specified, a default of :: will be used.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的GTM虚拟服务器时，如果未指定此参数，则将使用默认值 :: 。

trans-unit.source: When creating a new GTM virtual server, this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的GTM虚拟服务器时,这个参数是必须的。

trans-unit.source: When declared in a :vars section, INI values are interpreted as strings. For example var=FALSE would create a string equal to ‘FALSE’. Unlike host lines, :vars sections accept only a single entry per line, so everything after the = must be the value for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 在 :vars 节中声明时，INI值将解释为字符串。例如， var=FALSE 将创建一个等于'FALSE'的字符串。与主机行不同， :vars 节每行仅接受一个条目，因此 = 之后的所有内容必须是条目的值。

trans-unit.source: When declared in a :vars section, INI values are interpreted as strings. For example var=FALSE would create a string equal to FALSE. Unlike host lines, :vars sections accept only a single entry per line, so everything after the = must be the value for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 在 :vars 节中声明时，INI值将解释为字符串。例如， var=FALSE 将创建一个等于 FALSE 的字符串。与主机行不同， :vars 节每行仅接受一个条目，因此 = 之后的所有内容必须是条目的值。

trans-unit.source: When declared inline with the host, INI values are interpreted as Python literal structures (strings, numbers, tuples, lists, dicts, booleans, None). Host lines accept multiple key=value parameters per line. Therefore they need a way to indicate that a space is part of a value rather than a separator.
trans-unit.target: 与主机内联声明时，INI值将解释为Python文字结构（字符串，数字，元组，列表，字典，布尔值，无）。主机行每行接受多个 key=value 参数。因此，他们需要一种方法来指示空格是值的一部分而不是分隔符。

trans-unit.source: When declared inline with the host, INI values are processed by Python’s ast.literal_eval function (https://docs.python.org/2/library/ast.html#ast.literal_eval) and interpreted as Python literal structures (strings, numbers, tuples, lists, dicts, booleans, None). Host lines accept multiple key=value parameters per line. Therefore they need a way to indicate that a space is part of a value rather than a separator.
trans-unit.target: 与主机内联声明时，INI值由Python的ast.literal_eval函数（https://docs.python.org/2/library/ast.html#ast.literal_eval）处理，并解释为Python文字结构（字符串，数字，元组，列表，字典，布尔值，无）。主机行每行接受多个 key=value 参数。因此，他们需要一种方法来指示空格是值的一部分而不是分隔符。

trans-unit.source: When defining a host using an IPv6 address, just add the IPv6 address as you would an IPv4 address or hostname:

trans-unit.source: When defining groups of groups in the static inventory file, the child groups must also be defined in the static inventory file, otherwise ansible returns an error. If you want to define a static group of dynamic child groups, define the dynamic groups as empty in the static inventory file. For example:

trans-unit.source: When defining the task, resource_name must be set to the DSC resource being used - in this case the resource_name should be set to Registry. The module_version can refer to a specific version of the DSC resource installed; if left blank it will default to the latest version. The other options are parameters that are used to define the resource, such as Key and ValueName. While the options in the task are not case sensitive, keeping the case as-is is recommended because it makes it easier to distinguish DSC resource options from Ansible’s win_dsc options.
trans-unit.target: 定义任务时，必须将 resource_name 设置为正在使用的DSC资源-在这种情况下， resource_name 应该设置为 Registry 。该 module_version 可以参考安装DSC资源的特定版本;如果保留为空白，则默认为最新版本。其他选项是用于定义资源的参数，例如 Key 和 ValueName 。尽管任务中的选项不区分大小写，但建议保持大小写不变，因为这样可以更轻松地将DSC资源选项与Ansible的 win_dsc 选项区分开。

trans-unit.source: When deleting a cluster, the information returned is the state of the cluster prior to deletion.
trans-unit.target: 删除群集时,返回的信息是群集在删除前的状态。

trans-unit.source: When deleting a record all values for the record must be specified or Route 53 will not delete it.
When deleting a record all values for the record must be specified or Route53 will not delete it.
trans-unit.target: 删除记录时,必须指定记录的所有值,否则Route53将不会删除该记录。

trans-unit.source: When deleting a rule set, deactivate it first (AWS prevents deletion of the active rule set).
trans-unit.target: 删除规则集时,先停用规则集(AWS防止删除活动规则集)。

trans-unit.source: When deleting routes for a VRF, all routes inside the VRF are deleted, but the VRF is not deleted.
trans-unit.target: 删除VRF的路由时,VRF内部的所有路由都会被删除,但VRF不会被删除。

trans-unit.source: When dependencies are encountered by ansible-galaxy, it will automatically install each dependency to the roles_path. To understand how dependencies are handled during play execution, see Roles.
trans-unit.target: 当 ansible-galaxy 遇到依赖关系时，它将自动将每个依赖关系安装到 roles_path 。要了解在播放执行过程中如何处理依赖关系，请参见角色。

trans-unit.source: When dependencies block the removal, consider using cascade.
trans-unit.target: 当依赖项阻止删除时，请考虑使用cascade。

trans-unit.source: When details is false, returns an array of service ARNs, otherwise an array of complex objects as described below.
trans-unit.target: 当details为false时,返回一个服务ARN的数组,否则返回一个复杂对象的数组,如下所述。

trans-unit.source: When devices in a group share the same variable values, such as OS or SSH user, you can reduce duplication and simplify maintenance by consolidating these into group variables:
trans-unit.target: 当一个组中的设备共享相同的变量值时,如操作系统或SSH用户,您可以通过将这些变量合并到组变量中来减少重复和简化维护。

trans-unit.source: When disabled, routing is done by the linux kernel.
trans-unit.target: 当禁用时,路由是由linux内核完成的。

trans-unit.source: When disabled, the IPv4 configuration will be cleared and IPv4 connectivity disabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用时,将清除IPv4配置,禁止IPv4连接。

trans-unit.source: When disabled, the system does not advertise routes for this virtual address.
trans-unit.target: 禁用时,系统不为该虚拟地址发布路由广告。

trans-unit.source: When disabling a server, immediately terminate all the sessions attached to the specified server.
trans-unit.target: 当禁用服务器时,立即终止连接到指定服务器的所有会话。

trans-unit.source: When doing –list, send the inventory to a file instead of to the screen
trans-unit.target: 执行–list时，将清单发送到文件而不是发送到屏幕

trans-unit.source: When doing a recursive copy set the mode for the directories.
trans-unit.target: 在进行递归复制时,设置目录的模式。

trans-unit.source: When doing a recursive copy, see also directory_mode.
trans-unit.target: 在进行递归复制时，另请参见 directory_mode 。

trans-unit.source: When doing an –list, represent in a way that is optimized for export,not as an accurate representation of how Ansible has processed it
trans-unit.target: 在执行–list时，请以针对导出进行优化的方式表示，而不是Ansible处理方式的准确表示

trans-unit.source: When doing plugin development, it is very useful to have the warning() method during development, but it is also important to emit warnings for deadends (cases that you expect should never be triggered) or corner cases (e.g. cases where you expect misconfigurations).
trans-unit.target: 在进行插件开发时，在开发过程中使用 warning() 方法非常有用，但是对于死角（您希望永远不会触发的情况）或极端情况（例如您预期配置错误的情况）发出警告也很重要。 。

trans-unit.source: When downtime should start, in time_t format (epoch seconds).
trans-unit.target: 停机时间应该何时开始,以time_t格式(epoch秒)表示。

trans-unit.source: When dropping a language, also delete object that depend on this language.
trans-unit.target: 当放弃一种语言时,也要删除依赖这种语言的对象。

trans-unit.source: When enabled qos and network_filter are automatically set to None and port_mirroring to False.
trans-unit.target: 启用后， qos 和 network_filter 会自动设置为None， port_mirroring 会设置为False。

trans-unit.source: When enabled SECONDARY members will not service reads.
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,SECONDARY成员将不为读服务。

trans-unit.source: When enabled and migratable not specified then migratable is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当启用，并且 migratable 没有指定然后 migratable 已启用。

trans-unit.source: When enabled and a proxy for a protocol runs out of room in its session table, that protocol goes into failopen mode and enacts the action specified by av-failopen.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,当一个协议的代理在其会话表中没有空间时,该协议就会进入failopen模式,并执行av-failopen指定的操作。

trans-unit.source: When enabled dstaddr specifies what the destination address must NOT be.
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,dstaddr指定目标地址不能是什么。

trans-unit.source: When enabled internet-service specifies what the service must NOT be.
trans-unit.target: 启用internet-service后,指定服务不得是什么。

trans-unit.source: When enabled internet-service-src specifies what the service must NOT be.
trans-unit.target: 当启用internet-service-src时,指定服务不得是什么。

trans-unit.source: When enabled service specifies what the service must NOT be.
trans-unit.target: 当启用service时,指定服务不得是什么。

trans-unit.source: When enabled srcaddr specifies what the source address must NOT be.
trans-unit.target: 启用时,srcaddr 指定源地址不能是什么。

trans-unit.source: When enabled the parameter is hidden in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,该参数在用户界面中被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, Internet Services match against any internet service EXCEPT the selected Internet Service.
trans-unit.target: 启用时,互联网服务将与任何互联网服务进行匹配,但所选互联网服务除外。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, OSPF will not run on the interface, but the subnet will still be advertised.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,OSPF将不会在接口上运行,但子网仍会被广告。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, VMs in this subnetwork without external IP addresses can access Google APIs and services by using Private Google Access.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,此子网络中没有外部 IP 地址的虚拟机可以使用 Private Google Access 访问 Google API 和服务。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, allows SSL sessions whose server certificate validation failed.
trans-unit.target: 启用时,允许服务器证书验证失败的SSL会话。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, allows the system to send return traffic to the MAC address that transmitted the request, even if the routing table points to a different network or interface.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,允许系统向发送请求的MAC地址发送返回流量,即使路由表指向不同的网络或接口。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, avi mirrors all tcp fastpath connections to standby.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,avi 将所有 tcp 快速路径连接镜像到待机。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, avi re-encrypts traffic to the backend servers.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,avi会对后端服务器的流量进行重新加密。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, avi will not trust intermediate and root certs presented by a client.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,avi将不信任客户端提交的中间和根证书。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, avi will only validate the revocation status of the leaf certificate using crl.
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,avi 将只使用 crl 验证叶证书的撤销状态。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, avi will verify via crl checks that certificates in the trust chain have not been revoked.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,avi将通过crl检查来验证信任链中的证书是否被撤销。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, destination addresses match against any address EXCEPT the specified destination addresses.
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,目标地址与任何地址匹配,但指定的目标地址除外。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, services match against any service EXCEPT the specified destination services.
trans-unit.target: 启用时,服务与任何服务进行匹配,但指定的目标服务除外。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, source addresses match against any address EXCEPT the specified source addresses.
trans-unit.target: 当启用时,源地址与除指定源地址外的任何地址进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the VM will automatically be powered on.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,虚拟机将自动开机。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the provided configuration will be utilized.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,将使用所提供的配置。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, the zone dataset will be mounted on /zones/archive upon removal.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，区域数据集将在删除后挂载在 /zones/archive 上。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this option allows lookup plugins (whether used in variables as {{lookup('foo')}} or as a loop as with_foo) to return data that is not marked ‘unsafe’. By default, such data is marked as unsafe to prevent the templating engine from evaluating any jinja2 templating language, as this could represent a security risk. This option is provided to allow for backwards-compatibility, however users should first consider adding allow_unsafe=True to any lookups which may be expected to contain data which may be run through the templating engine late
trans-unit.target: 启用后，此选项允许查找插件（无论在变量中用作 {{lookup('foo')}} 还是与with_foo一起用作循环）均返回未标记为“不安全”的数据。默认情况下，此类数据被标记为不安全，以防止模板引擎评估任何jinja2模板语言，因为这可能会带来安全风险。提供此选项是为了实现向后兼容，但是用户应首先考虑将allow_unsafe = True添加到任何可能包含通过模板引擎运行的数据的查询中

trans-unit.source: When enabling eAPI access the default is to enable HTTP on port 80, enable HTTPS on port 443, disable local HTTP, and disable Unix socket server. Use the options listed below to override the default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 当启用 eAPI 访问时,默认情况是在端口 80 上启用 HTTP,在端口 443 上启用 HTTPS,禁用本地 HTTP,以及禁用 Unix 套接字服务器。使用下面列出的选项来覆盖默认配置。

trans-unit.source: When environment variables are managed, no comment line is added, but, when the module needs to find/check the state, it uses the “name” parameter to find the environment variable definition line.
trans-unit.target: 在管理环境变量时，不添加任何注释行，但是，当模块需要查找/检查状态时，它将使用“名称”参数来查找环境变量定义行。

trans-unit.source: When exporting a certificate, if path is a directory then the module will fail, otherwise the file will be replaced if needed.
trans-unit.target: 导出证书时，如果path是目录，则模块将失败，否则将在需要时替换文件。

trans-unit.source: When false, reject the connection if the host key is not in known_hosts file.
trans-unit.target: 当false时,如果主机密钥不在known_hosts文件中,则拒绝连接。

trans-unit.source: When false, template failures during group and filter processing are silently ignored (eg, if a filter or group expression refers to an undefined host variable)
trans-unit.target: 当为 "false "时,在组和过滤器处理过程中的模板失败将被默默地忽略(例如,如果过滤器或组表达式指向一个未定义的主机变量)。

trans-unit.source: When fetch_all is False, GET requests to NetBox may become quite long and return a HTTP 414 (URI Too Long).
trans-unit.target: 当fetch_all为False时,对NetBox的GET请求可能会变得很长,并返回HTTP 414(URI Too Long)。

trans-unit.source: When fetching information about a disk, it is always recommended to specify a unit.
trans-unit.target: 在获取磁盘的信息时,总是建议指定一个单位。

trans-unit.source: When fetching information about a new disk and when the version of parted installed on the system is before version 3.1, the module queries the kernel through /sys/ to obtain disk information. In this case the units CHS and CYL are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 当获取有关新磁盘的信息以及系统上安装的parted版本为3.1之前的版本时，模块将通过 /sys/ 查询内核以获取磁盘信息。在这种情况下，不支持单位CHS和CYL。

trans-unit.source: When file_pull is True, this can be used to define the transfer protocol for copying file from remote to the NXOS device.
trans-unit.target: 当file_pull为True时,这可以用来定义将文件从远程复制到NXOS设备的传输协议。

trans-unit.source: When file_pull is True, this can be used to speed up file copies when the nxos running image supports the use-kstack option.
trans-unit.target: 当file_pull为True时,当nxos运行的映像支持use-kstack选项时,这可以用来加速文件拷贝。

trans-unit.source: When file_pull is True, this is used to compact nxos image files. This option can only be used with nxos image files.
trans-unit.target: 当 file_pull 为 True 时,这个选项用于压缩 nxos 映像文件。这个选项只能用于 nxos 图像文件。

trans-unit.source: When following a redirected URL, the Authorization header and any credentials set will be dropped and not redirected.
trans-unit.target: 当跟随重定向的URL时，将删除 Authorization 标头和任何凭据集，并且不会重定向。

trans-unit.source: When handling values returned by lookup plugins, Ansible uses a data type called unsafe to block templating. Marking data as unsafe prevents malicious users from abusing Jinja2 templates to execute arbitrary code on target machines. The Ansible implementation ensures that unsafe values are never templated. It is more comprehensive than escaping Jinja2 with {% raw %} ... {% endraw %} tags.
trans-unit.target: 在处理查找插件返回的值时，Ansible使用一种称为 unsafe 的数据类型来阻止模板。将数据标记为不安全可防止恶意用户滥用Jinja2模板在目标计算机上执行任意代码。Ansible实现可确保不对不安全的值进行模板化。它比使用 {% raw %} ... {% endraw %} 标记转义Jinja2更为全面。

trans-unit.source: When hardware is configured.
trans-unit.target: 硬件配置时。

trans-unit.source: When identifying an existing container name may be a name or a long or short container ID.
trans-unit.target: 当识别一个现有的容器名称时,可以是一个名称或长或短的容器ID。

trans-unit.source: When identifying an existing network name may be a name or a long or short network ID.
trans-unit.target: 当识别一个现有的网络名称时,可以是一个名称或长或短的网络ID。

trans-unit.source: When identifying the node use either the hostname of the node (as registered in Swarm) or node ID.
trans-unit.target: 识别节点时,使用节点的主机名(如在Swarm中注册的)或节点ID。

trans-unit.source: When image is owned by calling account and describe_image_attributes is yes.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像是通过调用帐户拥有的，并且describe_image_attributes为yes。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a script to obtain a vault password it may be convenient to know which vault ID label was requested. For example a script loading passwords from a secret manager may want to use the vault ID label to pick either the ‘dev’ or ‘prod’ password.
trans-unit.target: 在实施脚本以获取文件库密码时，可以方便地知道请求了哪个文件库ID标签。例如，从机密管理器加载密码的脚本可能要使用库ID标签来选择“开发”或“生产”密码。

trans-unit.source: When importing a certificate for usage in IIS, it is generally required to use the machine key_storage option, as both default and user will make the private key unreadable to IIS APPPOOL identities and prevent binding the certificate to the https endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 导入证书以供IIS使用时，通常需要使用 machine key_storage选项，因为 default 和 user 都将使私钥对于IIS APPPOOL身份不可读，并阻止将证书绑定到https端点。

trans-unit.source: When importing a policy to attach to a parent policy, the encoding of the imported policy, if different, must be set to be the same value as parent_policy, otherwise import will fail.
trans-unit.target: 导入要附加到 parent 策略的策略时，如果导入的策略的 encoding 不同，则必须将其编码设置为与 parent_policy 相同的值，否则导入将失败。

trans-unit.source: When in verbose mode it will act the same as the default callback
trans-unit.target: 当处于verbose模式时,它将与默认的回调相同。

trans-unit.source: When instances are created.
trans-unit.target: 创建实例时。

trans-unit.target: 当实例被重新创建。

trans-unit.target: 当配置好接口后。

trans-unit.target: 对于Ansible任务选项，例如 tags 和条件语句（ when: ：）：

trans-unit.source: When it is enabled, all files created with write permissions on the volume will be WORM appendable files by default.
trans-unit.target: 启用该功能后,在卷上创建的所有具有写权限的文件默认为WORM可附加文件。

trans-unit.source: When it was created
trans-unit.target: 创建时

trans-unit.source: When l(duration) is not specified, the server default is used.
trans-unit.target: 未指定l(duration)时,使用服务器默认值。

trans-unit.source: When l(state=absent), the module will remove the specified DNS zone and all subsequent DNS records.
trans-unit.target: 当l(state=absent)时,该模块将删除指定的DNS区域和所有后续的DNS记录。

trans-unit.source: When l(state=present)
trans-unit.target: 当l(state=present)

trans-unit.source: When l(state=present) the module will attempt to create the specified DNS zone if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 当l(state=present)时,如果指定的DNS区域还不存在,该模块将尝试创建该区域。

trans-unit.source: When l(type=secondary), the DNS server will immediately attempt to perform a zone transfer from the servers in this list. If this initial transfer fails, then the zone will be left in an unworkable state. This module does not verify the initial transfer.
trans-unit.target: 当l(type=secondary)时,DNS服务器将立即尝试从这个列表中的服务器中进行一次区域转移。如果这个初始转移失败,那么该区将处于无法工作的状态。本模块不验证初始转移。

trans-unit.source: When lacp timeout type is 'Fast', user-defined time can be a number(3~90).
trans-unit.target: 当lacp超时类型为'Fast'时,用户自定义的时间可以是一个数字(3~90)。

trans-unit.source: When lease pool is referenced in full path format, the partition parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当以全路径格式引用租用池时，将忽略 partition 参数。

trans-unit.source: When list_all=no and value is not set, a string containing the value of the setting in name
trans-unit.target: 当list_all=no且未设置value时,在name中包含设置值的字符串。

trans-unit.source: When list_all=yes, a dict containing key/value pairs of multiple configuration settings
trans-unit.target: 当list_all=yes时,一个包含多个配置设置的键/值对的dict。

trans-unit.source: When looking up a path for parameters under it a dictionary will be returned for each path. If there is no parameter under that path then the return will be successful but the dictionary will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 当查找一个路径下的参数时,将为每个路径返回一个字典。如果该路径下没有参数,则返回成功,但字典为空。

trans-unit.source: When looping over complex data structures, the console output of your task can be enormous. To limit the displayed output, use the label directive with loop_control:
trans-unit.target: 当遍历复杂的数据结构时，任务的控制台输出可能非常庞大。要限制显示的输出，请将 label 指令与 loop_control 一起使用：

trans-unit.source: When making changes to the embedded web services's login passwords, api_password will be used and current_admin_password will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当对嵌入式Web服务的登录密码进行修改时,将使用api_password,而忽略current_admin_password。

trans-unit.source: When making changes to the proxy web services's login passwords, api_password will be used and current_admin_password will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 更改代理Web服务的登录密码时,将使用api_password,忽略current_admin_password。

trans-unit.source: When max allocated storage is present.
trans-unit.target: 当存在最大分配的存储空间时。

trans-unit.target: 当metrics_collection被启用时,这将决定CloudWatch收集的指标的粒度。

trans-unit.source: When migrating to collection we decided to use only _info modules.
trans-unit.target: 当迁移到收集时,我们决定只使用_info模块。

trans-unit.source: When modifying a line the regexp should typically match both the initial state of the line as well as its state after replacement by line to ensure idempotence.
trans-unit.target: 修改线时，正则表达式通常应匹配线的初始状态以及被 line 替换后的状态，以确保幂等。

trans-unit.source: When more then one block should be handled in one file you must change the marker per task.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个文件中要处理一个以上的块，则必须为每个任务更改标记。

trans-unit.source: When multicast is set to Broadcast Subnet the ipv4addr parameter is used to specify the subnet.
trans-unit.target: 当组播设置为广播子网时,ipv4addr参数用来指定子网。

trans-unit.source: When multiple elements are included in the list (and state is present), the elements are guaranteed to appear in the same relative order in the resultant path value.
trans-unit.target: 当多个元件（和包含在列表中 state 是 present ），这些元件被保证出现在所得到的路径值相同的相对顺序。

trans-unit.source: When multiple se groups are used in a cloud with host attributes specified,just a single se group can exist as a match-all se group without a
trans-unit.target: 当在云中使用多个se组并指定了主机属性时,只有一个se组可以作为全部匹配的se组存在,而不需要指定主机属性。

trans-unit.source: When negated, this matches all packets with the RST or the ACK bits set.
trans-unit.target: 当被否定时,这将匹配所有设置了RST或ACK位的数据包。

trans-unit.source: When network options are changed, the module disconnects all containers from the network, deletes the network, and re-creates the network. It does not try to reconnect containers, except the ones listed in (connected, and even for these, it does not consider specific connection options like fixed IP addresses or MAC addresses. If you need more control over how the containers are connected to the network, loop the community.docker.docker_container module to loop over your containers to make sure they are connected properly.

When network options are changed, the module disconnects all containers from the network, deletes the network, and re-creates the network. It does not try to reconnect containers, except the ones listed in (connected, and even for these, it does not consider specific connection options like fixed IP addresses or MAC addresses. If you need more control over how the containers are connected to the network, loop the community.general.docker_container module to loop over your containers to make sure they are connected properly.
trans-unit.target: 更改网络选项后，模块将断开所有容器与网络的连接，删除网络，然后重新创建网络。它不会尝试重新连接容器，除了（connected中列出的那些容器，即使是这些容器，它也不会考虑特定的连接选项，例如固定IP地址或MAC地址。如果您需要对容器如何连接到网络的更多控制权， ，循环community.general.docker_container模块以遍历您的容器，以确保它们正确连接。

trans-unit.source: When networks are provided to the module via the networks option, the module behaves differently than docker run --network: docker run --network other will create a container with network other attached, but the default network not attached. This module with networks: {name: other} will create a container with both default and other attached. If purge_networks is set to yes, the default network will be removed afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 通过networks选项将网络提供给模块时，模块的行为与 docker run --network 不同： docker run --network other 将创建一个容器，其中该容器附加了network other ，但默认网络未附加。具有以下网络的模块：{name：other}将创建一个容器，其中包含 default 容器和 other 容器。如果将purge_networks设置为 yes ，则此后将删除 default 网络。

trans-unit.source: When new value is present on value change
trans-unit.target: 价值变化时出现新价值时

trans-unit.source: When no given Hook found, will create one.
trans-unit.target: 当没有找到给定的Hook时,将创建一个。

trans-unit.source: When nodes come online, it may not be sufficient to wait for the next cycle of an ansible command to come along and configure that node.
trans-unit.target: 当节点上线时,可能不足以等待下一个周期的ansible命令来配置该节点。

trans-unit.source: When none of the specified hostRules match, the request is redirected to a URL specified by defaultUrlRedirect. If defaultUrlRedirect is specified, defaultService or defaultRouteAction must not be set.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的hostRules都不匹配时,请求将被重定向到defaultUrlRedirect指定的URL。如果指定了defaultUrlRedirect,则不能设置defaultService或defaultRouteAction。

trans-unit.source: When not check_mode.
trans-unit.target: 当不check_mode时。

trans-unit.source: When not defined the default of epoch is used when creating a new schedule.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则在创建新时间表时使用默认的 epoch 。

trans-unit.source: When not defined the default of indefinite is used when creating a new schedule.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则在创建新计划时使用默认值 indefinite 。

trans-unit.source: When not defined the default value of all is used when creating a new schedule.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则在创建新计划时使用默认值 all 。

trans-unit.source: When not defined will default to the port on which each target receives traffic from the load balancer.
trans-unit.target: 未定义时,将默认为每个目标从负载均衡器接收流量的端口。

trans-unit.source: When not defined, the default of 0:00 is used when creating a new schedule.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，则在创建新计划时使用默认值 0:00 。
